org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css

Class CSSFontFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.common.SourceLocation
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.css.CSSFontFace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISourceLocation, ICSSFontFace, ICSSNode

    public class CSSFontFace
extends SourceLocation
implements ICSSFontFace
    Implementation for @font-face statement DOM.

    • Field Detail

      • children

        protected final List<ICSSNode> children
        A list of children nodes. The sub-classes can add nodes to this list in their constructors.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CSSFontFace

        protected CSSFontFace(List<CSSProperty> properties,
           org.antlr.runtime.tree.CommonTree tree,
           org.antlr.runtime.TokenStream tokenStream)
        Construct a CSSFontFace from a list of properties. The parser doesn't validate if the properties are acceptable by the @font-face statement, so that we don't need to update the grammar when new properties are added to @font-face statement.
        Parameters:
        properties - key value pairs inside the @font-face block.

    • Method Detail

      • getSources

        public ArrayList<ICSSPropertyValue> getSources()

      • getSourceType

        public FontFaceSourceType getSourceType()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSFontFace
        Get the font source type. A font can be loaded either by its filename (by using src:url) or by its system font name (by using src:local).
        Specified by:
        getSourceType in interface ICSSFontFace
        Returns:
        Font source type. Either url() or local().

      • getSourceValue

        public String getSourceValue()
        Specified by:
        getSourceValue in interface ICSSFontFace
        Returns:
        If the source type is FontFaceSourceType.URL, the return value is the URL of the font file path; If the source type is FontFaceSourceType.LOCAL, the return value is the system font name.

      • getFontFamily

        public String getFontFamily()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSFontFace
        The fontFamily property sets the alias for the font that you use to apply the font in style sheets. This property is required. If you embed a font with a family name that matches the family name of a system font, the Flex compiler gives you a warning. You can disable this warning by setting the show-shadows-system-font-warnings compiler option to false.
        Specified by:
        getFontFamily in interface ICSSFontFace
        Returns:
        Font family name of this font-face statement. The font family name can be used in the later CSS rulesets' font-family properties.

      • getFontStyle

        public String getFontStyle()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSFontFace
        Get the "style" type face value of the font. Possible values are "normal", "italic" and "oblique". If the value is not set in the CSS document, this method returns the default font style "normal".
        Specified by:
        getFontStyle in interface ICSSFontFace
        Returns:
        Font style.

      • getFontWeight

        public String getFontWeight()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSFontFace
        Get the "weight" type face value of the font. Possible values are "normal", "bold" and "heavy". If the value is not set in the CSS document, this method returns the default font style "normal".
        Specified by:
        getFontWeight in interface ICSSFontFace
        Returns:
        Font style.

      • getEmbedAsCFF

        public boolean getEmbedAsCFF()

      • getAdvancedAntiAliasing

        public boolean getAdvancedAntiAliasing()
        Description copied from interface: ICSSFontFace
        The advancedAntiAliasing property determines whether to include the advanced anti-aliasing information when embedding the font. This property is optional. The default value is true.
        Specified by:
        getAdvancedAntiAliasing in interface ICSSFontFace
        Returns:
        True if this font face uses advanced anti-aliasing.
